entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
